name: The Temple (Yuliya Kozhemyako (Supr))
description:
A small toy created for Ludum Dare 36: Ancient Technology.

Controls:

move - WASD
restart - R
fullscreen/windowed - 0
Esc to exit

full hd resolution - 4
hd resolution - 3

audio from freesound.org by esistnichtsoernst

I used egg tempera and simplex noise for creating the textures. You can check out the video about the creative process.
